document.full_text: country star shania twain will end her self-imposed career hiatus by starting a two-year residency in las vegas in december 2012, she said wednesday.
document.title: shania twain to resume career with vegas residency
lines_and_colors: country star shania twain will end her self-imposed career hiatus by starting a two-year residency in las vegas in december 2012, she said wednesday.
